Description.Title: SoilTemperatureSWAT
Description.ExtendedDescription: Strategy for the calculation of soil temperature with the SWAT method. Reference: Neitsch, S.L., Arnold, J.G., Kiniry, J.R., Williams, J.R., King, K.W. Soil and Water Assessment Tool. Theoretical Documentation. Version 2000. http://swatmodel.tamu.edu/media/1290/swat2000theory.pdf
Description.ShortDescription: Soil temperature by layers computed using the SWAT approach.

Input.name: LagCoefficient
Input.description: Lag coefficient that controls the influence of the previous day's temperature on the current day's temperature

Input.name: SoilTemperatureByLayers
Input.description: Previous day's soil temperature of each layer

Input.name: VolumetricWaterContent
Input.description: Volumetric soil water content for each layer

Input.name: LayerThickness
Input.description: Soil layer thickness for each layer

Output.name: SoilTemperatureByLayers
Output.description: Updated soil temperature of each layer

Function.name: Init
Function.description: Initialize SoilTemperatureByLayers to 15 degC for each layer based on LayerThickness length.

Function.name: Estimate
Function.description: Compute updated SoilTemperatureByLayers using the SWAT method.
